result.purpose: Responsible for categorizing various types of transactions in a web3 context, including approvals, deposits, swaps, and NFT transactions.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file handles specific transaction categorization logic, promoting separation of concerns and maintainability.

internal/domains/web3/categorize/approva.purpose: Categorizes transaction approvals in a web3 context.

internal/domains/web3/categorize/categor.purpose: Categorizes transactions based on user input and transaction details.

internal/domains/web3/categorize/deposit.purpose: Categorizes deposit transactions based on input signatures and transfer details.

internal/domains/web3/categorize/helper..purpose: This file provides helper functions for categorizing and managing balances of tokens and NFTs in a web3 context.

internal/domains/web3/categorize/mkp.go.purpose: Categorizes NFT transactions based on user balance and transfers.

internal/domains/web3/categorize/swap.go.purpose: Categorizes swap transactions based on user input and balance.

internal/domains/web3/categorize/transfe.purpose: Categorizes cryptocurrency transfer transactions based on user actions and balances.
